snippet: For years, Kenny G’s saxophone instrumental “Going Home” has been piped into shopping malls, schools, train stations and gyms in China as a signal to the public that it is time, indeed, to go.
abstract: Enduring mystery in China is its love affair with Going Home, 1989 smash-hit saxophone instrumental by American musician Kenny G; across the country, the song is used to indicate to school children, store patrons and train stations that it is time to leave.
lead_paragraph: For years, Kenny G’s saxophone instrumental “Going Home” has been piped into shopping malls, schools, train stations and gyms in China as a signal to the public that it is time, indeed, to go.

headline.main: China Says Goodbye in the Key of G: Kenny G
headline.print_headline: At Closing Time, China Says Goodnight in the Key of G: Kenny G
